m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Declines Today After China Limits Electric Vehicle Subsidies - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Declines Today After China Limits Electric Vehicle Subsidies By Tony Owusu | 12/30/14 - 10:41 AM EST Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) shares are down 0.6% to $224.37 in early market trading on Tuesday following reports that the Chinese government is planning to extend its electric vehicle subsidies to 2020. However, the subsidies will only apply to domestically made electric vehicles while excluding imports like Tesla, according to Reuters.  China is investing in green technology as pollution, due in part to the country's emergin
